generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Behavior.swim Idle Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity go idle, if swimming. Entity must be in water.

fields.title: Idle Time
fields.description: Amount of time (in seconds) to stay idle. Default value: 5.

fields.title: Success Rate
fields.description: Percent chance this entity will go idle, 1.0 = 100%. Default value: 0.1.
